remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  The union of all acceptable functions is a function.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem7 $p |- Fun recs ( F ) $.
$d F f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
